languages.text: "Подобные живые маски — привилегия светлейших из наших господ. Пускай я не из черни, но право носить сменное лицо... мне еще предстоит заслужить". {n}Мейв бросает восторженный взгляд в сторону дворян, чьи лица — точнее, чужие лица — туго натянуты на металлические крепления. Губы многих застыли в неестественной улыбке — трудно сказать, виновата в том сила натяжения, или это лишь рьяная демонстрация радости.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Маски — привилегия господ и... скоморохов. Я лишь придворная служанка, м{mf|ой|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}". {n}Лидзи смущенно опускает голову, и вы замечаете на ее шее старый шрам, напоминающий укус хлыста.{/n}

languages.text: "Such living masks are the privilege of the high nobility. I may not be a commoner, but to be entitled to a change of face... That is something I have yet to earn." {n}Maive casts a fascinated eye over the nobles whose faces — inasmuch as they are theirs — are stretched tight over metal fixtures. Many have their mouths frozen in an unnatural smile, and it is hard to tell whether this is a consequence of the tightness, or simply an eager show of delight.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Подобные живые маски — привилегия светлейших из наших господ. Пускай я не из черни, но право носить сменное лицо... мне еще предстоит заслужить". {n}Мейв бросает восторженный взгляд в сторону дворян, чьи лица — точнее, чужие лица — туго натянуты на металлические крепления. Губы многих застыли в неестественной улыбке — трудно сказать, виновата в том сила натяжения, или это лишь рьяная демонстрация радости.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Such living masks are the privilege of the high nobility. I may not be a commoner, but to be entitled to a change of face... That is something I have yet to earn." {n}Maive casts a fascinated eye over the nobles whose faces — inasmuch as those faces are theirs — are pulled tightly over metal fixtures. Many of them have their mouths frozen in an unnatural smile, and it is hard to tell whether that is an effect of the tightness, or just an eager display of delight.{/n}

"Such living masks are the privilege of high nobility. I may not be of common stock, but to be entitled to a change of face... that is something I have yet to earn." {n}Maive casts an fascinated eye at those nobles whose faces, like the governor's, are attached by intricate means.{/n}

That is something I have yet to earn." {n}Maive casts a fascinated eye over the nobles whose faces — inasmuch as those faces are theirs — are pulled tightly over metal fixtures. Many of them have their mouths frozen in an unnatural smile, and it is hard to tell whether that is an effect of the tightness, or just an eager display of delight.{/n}

languages.text: “只有高阶贵族，才有权佩戴用人皮制成的面具。或许我确实与平民有别，但随意改变自己的相貌……我还没得到这样的权利。”{n}梅芙以着迷的目光注视着那些贵族，所有人的脸都被金属装置死死地拉扯着。许多人的嘴唇都僵住了，脸上露出了不自然的微笑，很难说这是夹具拉扯的结果，还是由于他们迫切想要表达心中的喜悦。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Such living masks are the privilege of the high nobility. I may not be a commoner, but to be entitled to a change of face... That is something I have yet to earn." {n}Maive casts a fascinated eye over the nobles whose faces — inasmuch as they are theirs — are stretched tight over metal fixtures. Many have their mouths frozen in an unnatural smile, and it is hard to tell whether this is a consequence of the tightness, or simply an eager show of delight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “只有高阶贵族，才有权佩戴用人皮制成的面具。或许我确实与平民有别，但随意改变自己的相貌……我还没得到这样的权利。”{n}梅芙以着迷的目光注视着那些贵族，所有人的脸都被金属装置死死地拉扯着。许多人的嘴唇都僵住了，脸上露出了不自然的微笑，很难说这是夹具拉扯的结果，还是由于他们迫切想要表达心中的喜悦。{/n}

languages.text: 「あの生きた仮面は、高位貴族だけに許された特権なのです。私は平民ではありませんが、顔を取り替える権利となると…まだその資格は得られていません」{n}メイヴはまるで魅了されたかのように貴族たちを見つめていた。彼らの顔は…それを彼ら自身の顔とするならば、金属の器具にぴったりと張りつけられていた。多くの者の口元は不自然な笑みのまま凍りついており、それが皮膚の張りのせいなのか、あるいは純粋な喜びの誇示なのかを判別するのは難しかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Such living masks are the privilege of the high nobility. I may not be a commoner, but to be entitled to a change of face... That is something I have yet to earn." {n}Maive casts a fascinated eye over the nobles whose faces — inasmuch as they are theirs — are stretched tight over metal fixtures. Many have their mouths frozen in an unnatural smile, and it is hard to tell whether this is a consequence of the tightness, or simply an eager show of delight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あの生きた仮面は、高位貴族だけに許された特権なのです。私は平民ではありませんが、顔を取り替える権利となると…まだその資格は得られていません」{n}メイヴはまるで魅了されたかのように貴族たちを見つめていた。彼らの顔は…それを彼ら自身の顔とするならば、金属の器具にぴったりと張りつけられていた。多くの者の口元は不自然な笑みのまま凍りついており、それが皮膚の張りのせいなのか、あるいは純粋な喜びの誇示なのかを判別するのは難しかった。{/n}

languages.text: «Las máscaras de piel son un privilegio de la alta nobleza. Puede que yo no pertenezca a la plebe, pero el derecho a un cambio de rostro... eso es algo que aún no me he ganado». {n}Maive mira fascinada a los nobles cuyos semblantes, más ajenos que propios, están estirados y unidos a enganches metálicos. Muchos tienen las bocas congeladas en una sonrisa antinatural, y no sabes si se debe a la tirantez o si se trata de una genuina exhibición de deleite.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Such living masks are the privilege of the high nobility. I may not be a commoner, but to be entitled to a change of face... That is something I have yet to earn." {n}Maive casts a fascinated eye over the nobles whose faces — inasmuch as they are theirs — are stretched tight over metal fixtures. Many have their mouths frozen in an unnatural smile, and it is hard to tell whether this is a consequence of the tightness, or simply an eager show of delight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Las máscaras de piel son un privilegio de la alta nobleza. Puede que yo no pertenezca a la plebe, pero el derecho a un cambio de rostro... eso es algo que aún no me he ganado». {n}Maive mira fascinada a los nobles cuyos semblantes, más ajenos que propios, están estirados y unidos a enganches metálicos. Muchos tienen las bocas congeladas en una sonrisa antinatural, y no sabes si se debe a la tirantez o si se trata de una genuina exhibición de deleite.{/n}

languages.text: "Böylesi yaşayan maskeler, yüksek soyluların ayrıcalığıdır. Avamdan olmayabilirim ama yüz değiştirme hakkına sahip olmak... Bunu henüz kazanamadım." {n}Maive, yüzleri metal tertibatlar üzerine gerilmiş soylulara hayran gözlerle bakıyor. Birçoğunun ağzı, doğal olmayan bir gülümsemeye ev sahipliği yapıyor. Bunun gerginlik sonucunda mu olduğunu yoksa keyiflerini hevesle gösterme çabalarının ürünü mü olduğunu anlamak zor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Such living masks are the privilege of the high nobility. I may not be a commoner, but to be entitled to a change of face... That is something I have yet to earn." {n}Maive casts a fascinated eye over the nobles whose faces — inasmuch as they are theirs — are stretched tight over metal fixtures. Many have their mouths frozen in an unnatural smile, and it is hard to tell whether this is a consequence of the tightness, or simply an eager show of delight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Böylesi yaşayan maskeler, yüksek soyluların ayrıcalığıdır. Avamdan olmayabilirim ama yüz değiştirme hakkına sahip olmak... Bunu henüz kazanamadım." {n}Maive, yüzleri metal tertibatlar üzerine gerilmiş soylulara hayran gözlerle bakıyor. Birçoğunun ağzı, doğal olmayan bir gülümsemeye ev sahipliği yapıyor. Bunun gerginlik sonucunda mu olduğunu yoksa keyiflerini hevesle gösterme çabalarının ürünü mü olduğunu anlamak zor.{/n}

languages.text: « Porter un masque vivant est un privilège de la haute noblesse. J'ai beau ne pas être une roturière, avoir le droit de changer de visage est encore quelque chose qu'il me faut mériter. » {n}Maive lance un coup d'œil fasciné vers les nobles, dont le visage, si tant est qu'il leur appartienne, est étiré sur du métal. La plupart ont la bouche figée en un sourire peu naturel, mais il est difficile de dire s'il s'agit là d'une conséquence de leur rigidité ou s'ils cherchent réellement à exprimer leur joie.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Such living masks are the privilege of the high nobility. I may not be a commoner, but to be entitled to a change of face... That is something I have yet to earn." {n}Maive casts a fascinated eye over the nobles whose faces — inasmuch as they are theirs — are stretched tight over metal fixtures. Many have their mouths frozen in an unnatural smile, and it is hard to tell whether this is a consequence of the tightness, or simply an eager show of delight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Porter un masque vivant est un privilège de la haute noblesse. J'ai beau ne pas être une roturière, avoir le droit de changer de visage est encore quelque chose qu'il me faut mériter. » {n}Maive lance un coup d'œil fasciné vers les nobles, dont le visage, si tant est qu'il leur appartienne, est étiré sur du métal. La plupart ont la bouche figée en un sourire peu naturel, mais il est difficile de dire s'il s'agit là d'une conséquence de leur rigidité ou s'ils cherchent réellement à exprimer leur joie.{/n}

languages.text: "Solche lebenden Masken sind das Privileg des Hochadels. Ich bin zwar keine einfache Bürgerin, aber eine Gesichtsveränderung ... Die muss ich mir erst noch verdienen." {n}Maive mustert fasziniert die Adligen, deren Gesichter – insofern es ihre sind – eng über Metallformen gelegt sind. Viele Münder sind in einem unnatürlichen Lächeln eingefroren, und man kann nur schwer sagen, ob das daran liegt, dass sie so stark gedehnt wurden, oder sich einfach nur freuen.{/n}
